title: When will the crash issue be fixed?
body:
I just came back from a hike, and had a "Game has crashed"
After reading the experiences that others have had, im not sure what to do, and wish to ask when it will be fixed
thank you

EDIT: I just got LeaverBuster for this, what the hell is going on???

replies.body:
Hey there,

This can be caused by many things, lets first rule out the most common by having you run a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).

Let me know if this helps.

Just tested, it did not work.
Please dont say i need to re-download
When exactly does the crash occur?
Whenever i start a game, and am about to enter

Apologies for the delayed response, I've been quite busy lately.

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
